data.text:
Wonderful holiday resort for families. 
Great location for beach and marine life fans. Definitely try snorkeling. They also offer all sort of water activities onsite, including diving (PADI), island trips, aqua aeropics, etc.
All the food in the restaurants is fresh and delicious locally outsourced, too.
Staff is friendly, helpful and dedicated people who go above and beyond to provide seemless service. Special shout out to Osama from Le Cafe, Waled from Exotic, Atef from The Waves, Mahmoud and Nour from the Front Office team. 
If you are looking for a polished glam luxury, that's not the place for you. But if you are in search of an easy and relaxed vacation place, with kind people, genuine smiles and fun music, Royal Monte-Carlo resort is definitely for you.
data.title: Perfect place for family and group holidays!

data.text:
Just returned from a 15 night stay.
Second time here this must be one of the top hotels in Egypt
Easy check in. Meals available until late.
Initial room was noisy during the night from the plant machinery.
New room soon allocated within one hour in the morning by reception. 
Do noy be afraid to contact reception or any of the staff if you have any problem they will sort it.
Hotel was not full so plenty of sun beds and loungers around the pool and in the beach area. 
Everywhere kept clean and tidy. 
Gardens magnificent.
Good snorkeling of the pier.
Be aware bars and restaurants set over three floors so lots of stairs.
Five restaurants apart from the main one. Chinese and Indian vey good.
Tasty Pizzas and burghers daily from the beach restaurant. (Waves).
Take a trip to Sharm Old Market for souvenirs only EGP470 about £8 return in taxi.
ALL staff cleaners, lifeguards, waiters chefs and managers absolutely brilliant very polite and helpful.
Special thanks to AYMAN,OSAMA (main restaurant). HANY) (reception bar}.
MICHAEL,OMAR,AKMED.ATAF. for looking after us and making our stay so enjoyable,
May be our last trip to Egypt but if we return it will be to this hotel.
data.title: Fabulous holiday

data.text:
A Beautiful resort, very peaceful and impressive.
We had a sea view room which was just like it is on their website wonderful.
The gardens are well kept and beautiful. 
There was music in the background which was just perfect not loud too.
The room was large and very nice but in need of a good deep clean.
The bathroom had a bath, a separate shower and a separate toilet bidet which seemed to need some cleaning there were plenty of toiletries. 
The fridge was well stocked  with soft drinks and water.
The staff were  very friendly and helpful.
There's 2 nice pools, plenty of sun beds and it not too busy in March.
The beach was a little disappointing it’s more of a ledge than an open sandy beach.
The annoying thing was the spa and surf staff that continually kept on harassing us to book with them … I am recovering from an accident so we just wanted to be left alone and enjoy the holiday.

We were disappointed with the main buffet restaurant it was pretty much the same every day,  there were different types of meat dishes everyday but they were dry over cooked and hard to eat without any sauce or gravy .
The fish was also overcooked and dry. The chefs and waiters were very friendly and polite, the desserts looked amazing but were kind of stale and looked fake and very tasteless.
There are a al carte restaurant we tried the Chinese which was ok.
The others especially the Indian was given such a bad reviews by some the other dinners we did not try it.
data.title: Beautiful

data.text:
We decided to make a visit to Sharm while it was quite cold in England.

The Monte Carlo Resort has been a lovely place to stay from start to finish.

The hotel, much like most in Sharm, is pretty big, and you are impressed from the moment you arrive.  The room we picked was spacious, and they had decorated it to help us celebrate an anniversary.  Although a little dated in design, it was satisfactory for what we needed.

Food choices were plenty, although we had to speak to the staff as we are vegetarian.  Osama and Ayman at the main restaurant could not do enough for us, and we had no complaints.  We even got to speak to the chefs who again made sure we had good food to eat.

At the Waves Bar near the pool, we had excellent service from Atef and his chef.  We were never left wanting for snacks and drinks.  

The staff felt like friends, and we always felt very welcome.  

I always find that if you are respectful, it will be returned.  

We would love to come back in the future and make more memories here.
data.title: A Fantastic Stay!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: thank you for for your Great words and for your support to us
owner_response.author: FO Manager

data.text: The best hotel in Sharm El Sheik March 2024 ! Hotel is very clean, rooms good. Beautiful garden ,nice beach, very good and high quality food and friendly staff! The best holiday with friends and family! Shops nearby, we liked the Mango market. We recommend!
data.title: Beautiful Garden 🌺
